name: Codersaurus.github.io
body:
# Welcome to Codersaurus This is a blog for learning how to code for the web. It is maintained by **[KidBlogger](http://kidincomeblog.com)**. ### Blog Post 1 - Bootstrap - Getting Started The first thing I want to take a look at is something called Bootstrap. Bootstrap can be found at **[http://getbootstrap.com](http://getbootstrap.com)**. I had heard about Bootstrap and how it is useful for making web sites really fast. So I am going to start blogging about Bootstrap 1. The first thing we should do is create a Bootstrap folder on the Desktop. This is where we will be working 2. The next thing we do is to go to the Bootstrap website and download the Bootstrap files by clicking on the big Download button:
![Bootstrap Download Button](/images/BootstrapDownloadButton.png) 3.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
